summary:
Don't like your crafting tabs to be cluttered with recipes? Now you can buy all the toys you want from a new unique merchant..

FULL CREDIT goes to calyps for making the toys
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=3][color=yellow]:::::::::::Full Credit goes to Calyps for his great toys and allowing me to publish this mod ::::::::::::[/color][/size][/b]


[b][size=3pt]::::::::: My Other Mods ::::::::::[/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35521]Olivia Wilde - Housecarl Replacer[/url][/size][/b]

[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31375]Hearthfire Alternative Library[/url][/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29635]Olivia Wilde - Nude Patches[/url][/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26611]Angelina Jolie - Nude Patches[/url][/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24894]Severus Jewelry Collection Merchant[/url][/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24559]SED7 Accessories and Piercings Merchant[/url][/size][/b]

[B][size=3pt]:::::::: Translations ::::::::[/size][/b]
[b][size=2pt][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30879]Adult Toys Merchant - NSFW - German by TKone[/url][/size][/b]


[size=3pt][b]::::::::: Version History ::::::::::[/b][/size]
[b]Read the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/readmes/Adult%20Toys%20Merchant%20-%20NSFW%20_readme.txt]READ ME[/url][/b]


[size=3pt][b]:::::::: Detailed Description ::::::::::[/b][/size]
This is my 1st attempt at modding, so I barely have any experience therefore any helpful feedback would be wonderful..

Basically I use many armor/etc mods (like so many other skyrim players) that adds various crafting recipes, Adult Toys by Calyps is 1 of these mods, I wanted to use his toys but having all those recipes along with ones from other mods made crafting anything a big pain in the butt ( like some of these toys :P ) plus the fact that the recipes required many different items which forces you to pretty much travel all over skyrim to get the material, so I decided to make a new unique merchant that sells Calyps's Adult Toys and changed the recipes so that they are not craft-able anymore.

The merchant is called Calypsia, she lives in Riften and this is her schedule:-
> From 9pm till 6am she will be inside The Bee and Barb inn
> From 6am till 2pm she sleeps at Haelga's bunk house then she eats lunch
> From 3pm till 8pm she goes to the market then she goes back to Haelga's bunkhouse to eat dinner then goes to the Bee and Barb Inn for the rest of the night

She sells his toys 24/7 at any location you find her at, you can even wake her up if she was a sleep to buy her toys, she can't be killed, she sells Calyps's Adult toys and a couple of other jewelries and she only buys jewelry, her shop re-spawns like any other merchant so don't worry if you buy all the toys and still want even more, just come back to her after a few days..

[b]Note[/b]: When I created her in CK, I had the CBBEv3 body by Caliente, lips and brows from Better Females, Covereyes by MrLenski, CBBE face pack, Nails from
Nails-Tan-Sunburn-Tattoos-Everything here-Check me Out by unkownRb, Killer Keos skimpy armors and clothes by Killer Keo. Non of this is included in this mod so I'm not sure what she will look like with your game, but as for her outfit, she will use whatever version of "fine clothes and fine boots" that you currently have in your game, will need feedback on this from people who use other body/cosmetic mods.

I have reduced the original values for some of the toys , because they became insanely expensive when they turned into merchant items, so in order to reduce the prices considerably I needed to have high haggling perk which I don't have, so I lowered their base values to half of the original, if you are rich, have high haggling perk and want the original values for the toys that was set by Calyps, let me know and I will make an optional file with them.

I have also reduced the weights of most of the toys, it was just weird for these toys to have the same weight as a full outfit, but I left some of the bigger toys with their original weights.

[size=3pt][b]::::::::: Future Plans::::::::[/b][/size]
None

[size=3pt][b]::::::: Installation Instructions :::::::[/b][/size]
1- Download my mod
2- Either apply it manually, unpack it, copy the all contents from my archive and place it at game's Data directory which is at steamsteamappscommonskyrimdata
Or download my mod with NMM
3- Play the game, find Calypsia and buy some kinky toys!


*******Upgrading to v1.5********
0- A clean save is recommended but not required
1- Sell everything you bought back to Calypsia
2- Exit the location you found her in then Save in a new slot
3- Close the game
4- Uninstall v1.4
5- Launch the game again and load your last save
6- Create a new save in a new slot
7- Exit the game and install v1.5


*******OPTIONAL FILE********
#Calyps Adult Toys Chest
Can be found near Honeyside in Riften, contains 20 of each sex toy, it respawns, reduced their value so that you don't get any ideas and take them all to sell, can be used with the main esp because all of the included toys in the chest have their own unique IDs..

Made this chest for some players that Calypsia seem to hate/attack and for those who don't wanna use the merchant..

You don't need the merchant esp sextoys-calyps-2 to be active in order to use the chest esp, you just need the textures and meshes included in the main mod file..


[size=3pt][b]:::::::: Uninstallation Instructions ::::::::[/b][/size]
0- If you bought a lot of toys then you may want to sell them before uninstalling in order to get some of the gold you've spent back
1- Get out of the Bee and Barb inn, go somewhere else (some other cell preferably)
2- Save
3- Exit the game
4- Uncheck sextoys-calyps-2.esp
5- Start the game and load the save you made last, click yes on the warning
6- Make a new save in a new slot and exit the game
7- Deactivate with NMM
OR if you want to do it manually
Go to SkyrimData, delete sextoys-calyps-2.esp
Go to Datameshessextoys-calyps < Delete this folder
Go to DatameshesactorscharacterFaceGenDataFaceGeom then delete a folder named "sextoys-calyps-2.esp"
Go to Datatexturessextoys-calyps < Delete this folder
Go to DatatexturesactorscharacterFaceGenDataFaceTint and delete a folder named "sextoys-calyps-2.esp"
10- Done

[b][size=3pt]::::::::: Incompatible With ::::::::::[/size][/b]
Non that I know of..

[size=3pt][b]::::::::::: Permission :::::::::[/b][/size]
[size=4pt][b]I got permission from [color=yellow]Calyps[/color] to publish this mod, all the items in this mod belongs to him. Full credit goes to him. According to him, any modder out there who wants to develop and use these assets can do so without asking for permission, just make sure to credit Calyps[/b][/size]
